hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira: Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "Whoever establishes the prayers on the night of Qadr out of sincere faith and hoping to attain Allah's rewards (not to show off) then all his past sins will be forgiven

chapter.ara-name: باب قِيَامُ لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ مِنَ الإِيمَانِ
chapter.eng-name: To establish the (Nawafil - voluntary) prayers on the night of Qadr is a part of faith
